Welcome to RUC-MESSAGEix-China (RMC) documentation!

The RUC-MESSAGEix-China (RMC) model is a provincial-scale energy-economy-environment (E3) integrated assessment model for China based on the open-source modelling framework MESSAGEix IIASA ECE Programme, 2020. It was co-developed by xxx’s group at the School of Applied Economics, Renmin University of China and Prof. xxx’s group at the School of Business, East China University of Science and Technology.
